BMDM Soundex

This is a fork of Beider-Morse and Daitch-Mokotoff soundex algorithms. Merged and reforged in object-oriented way for more convenient usage and development.

Description

On this page you can take a look at object model in class inheritance diagram and at detailed Beider-Morse class initialization process. It can be useful for development and understanding what is different between original BMPM and this fork.

Please note, that this documentation doesn't make a point to set a detailed explanation how both used phonetcis matching algorithms work. The B-M algorithm itself is described on Stephen P. Morse website: here and here. D-M algorithm mechanics are described on avotaynu.com website.
